name: biomni-run-autosite
title: Biomni: Run Autosite
description: Runs AutoSite to identify potential binding sites in a protein
content:
Overview

Runs AutoSite to identify potential binding sites in a protein structure. Uses geometric and energetic analysis to detect druggable pockets, cryptic sites, and allosteric binding locations for structure-based drug design.

Input Parameters

  • pdb_file (required): Path to protein structure PDB file
  • output_dir (required): Directory for AutoSite output files
  • spacing (optional): Grid spacing for site detection in Angstroms (default: 1.0)

Biological Use Case

Fundamental for structure-based drug design and target validation. Identifies druggable binding pockets before initiating virtual screening campaigns. Discovers allosteric sites for selective modulator development. Essential for fragment-based drug discovery and identifying novel binding sites beyond known active sites.

Output

Binding site predictions with coordinates, volumes, druggability scores, and site rankings saved to autosite_results.txt

Category

pharmacology
